tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Decades ago i had tooth ache suddenly so searched and found Smile clinic about to close for lunch. Yet Dr Uday Shetty was kind enough to attend my problem although it was lunch time. I was impressed by his quickly explaining me the dental problem i had then and treatment available for it in simple terms. Most important of all Smile clinic has a stamp if best in taking care of patients plus the staff is very cooperative while in the clinic or over the phone. I am a proud patron of Smile clinic for more than 20 years now.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Fractured Tooth,Toothache,Dental Cavities,Teeth Sensitive to Hot and Cold,
review: It was extremely inspiring that I was called well before my official time of appointment. The doctor and his entire team were very friendly as usual. Hygiene of the treatment room was quite up to the mark. He allowed the patient to understand the actual details of his problem. Medical environment was satisfactory and the time taken was normal. No post treatment side effects till now. In effect, my overall experience yesterday was too good. I am now preparing myself for the next performance of my dental root-canal correction tomorrow. Thanks a lot Doctor for your high orders of professionalism. ... Nisith B., Hiranandani Gardens, Powai, Mumbai 400076.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Laminates,Dental Cavities,Dental Implant Fixing,Dental Implant,
review:
I’m more than happy with the dental work done, I was very anxious about my entire treatment  procedures as they were  multiple and required lot of time commitment and patience  especially the work on the front teeth was very worried about how it will turn out and all…Their team tried to make this overwhelming ride as comfortable as possible. Also have to mention the staff were very kind and friendly always available to help. Dr. Uday is very professional, he takes time to explain what needs to be done and gives great advice. I highly recommend. 
Thank you.

review: Dr. Bhagyashree and Dr Shetty attended to me. They explained issue and options and helped me decide treatment I was comfortable with. Their hand was so light that I felt no pain. tags: Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Dr. Uday Shetty has a well-equipped clinic with a knowledgeable and experienced support staff.  I was informed about the cause of the dental problem. I was also shown X-rays and 3D model of my teeth. 
The ambience of the clinic also puts one at ease.
I highly recommend Dr. Uday Shetty to patients with dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Friendly & helpfull staff . Doctor gives priority to saving the  tooth and takes extreme care to solve you dental issues with minimal pain.Adequate guidance and information on dental problem given with a precise plan of action.Excellent work done  for my implants fitted on my grinders ( I can enjoy chewing food now 😀).Also happy with the quality of  after care advice to prevent further  issues.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: have visited Dr Uday Shetty multiple times and he is my favourite dentist in Mumbai. ** ** ************* ******* *** I donot remember going back to him for the same issue. he knows exactly what's wrong and resolves it in no time. I also took my parents to him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Very experienced doctor. Told me exactly what was possible. And what he could do to help me sort out the problem I had with my teeth. He gave me a realistic  idea of what my teeth would look like, on the computer, so that I knew what to expect. 
He also didn’t recommend anything  extra. Very , soft spoken and professional doctor. Really happy that my issue with my teeth was resolved quickly. Thank you Dr Shetty and team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My experience with Dr. Uday Shetty was very positive. ** ** ********* ******** *** did a number of deep dental fillings for me, all with minimal discomfort and pain. I previously had negative experiences with dentists in Toronto, but Dr Shetty with his skill and expertise has completely regained my trust in dentists. I would absolutely recommend him to anyone with dental issues, and will definitely be a future patient. Thank you so much, Dr. Shetty and team!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
At Dr. Uday Shetty's clinic the ambience is soothing and cheerful. 
Staff are friendly yet not inquisitive.
His treatment allows me to relax and sleep off on the dental chair which reflects the culture and competence that enables a great experience. It says a lot about the reassurance that I have at the clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Dr.  Shetty is our family dentist for over the period of more than 20 years, Beauty of this long  association is friendliness of Doctor and above all, he is a lovely human being.. Quality and hygiene is money's worth. 
Now despite the inconvenience to travel, on account of age and distance as we are located in the western suburbs, we can't think of switching over to any dentist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Dr. Uday Shetty is our family dental doctor for years now. I am very happy and pleased with his work. Full staff, assistant doctors are very polite, friendly and efficient in their work. This time I had my root canal and wisdom tooth extraction. And both times did not hurt during procedure. He is very experienced, very patient *** *** ***** ******* I strongly recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Dr Uday shetty  is an expert in all fields of dentistry. So going to Dr Uday is a one stop shop for any dental care issues. Also Dr Uday's treatment lasts a life time, which makes him the best dental surgeon/Practicioner I have ever met.  From small cavity fillings to artistic dentistry Dr Uday has it all. My entire family relies on Dr Uday for their dental work and I think you should too.
I highly recommend Dr Uday for any dental work.

* ***** *** ******* *** ** ***** ****** **** ** ***** **** 
No complaints 
But really really expensive they just quote you any price 
I think i was charged way too much for the treatment 
It was just one teeth and they charged me 18300 rupees
reply_text:
Thank you for your feedback.  
Redoing a failed root canal is not an easy job. It requires special skill hence it is more expensive than doing a regular root canal. It requires many more sittings too. The cost that you mentioned is misleading. It is not of the root canal alone but the entire treatment for that tooth including the crown.
Thank you for appreciating that we are good at our work.
